marketplaces.description: A curated collection of Claude Code skills

files.README.md:
# Skillcraft

A curated collection of Claude Code skills for design, development, and productivity.

## Installation

```bash
# Add the marketplace
/plugin marketplace add manashmandal/claude-skills

# Install the plugin
/plugin install skillcraft@skillcraft
```

## Available Skills

### Design Evaluation

Tools for reviewing and improving frontend design quality.

| Skill | Command | Description |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| `design-audit` | `/design-audit` | Quick design review without reference |
| `design-compare` | `/design-compare` | Compare implementation to Figma/mockup |
| `design-report` | `/design-report` | Expert analysis (Apple designer perspective) |

#### Usage Examples

```
"Review this screenshot for design issues"    → design-audit
"Compare my implementation to this Figma"     → design-compare
"Give me an expert design review"             → design-report
```

## Skill Categories

- **Design Evaluation** - UI/UX review, comparison, and expert analysis
- *More coming soon...*

## Structure

```
├── .claude-plugin/
│   ├── plugin.json           # Plugin metadata
│   └── marketplace.json      # Marketplace config
├── skills/                   # Skill definitions (SKILL.md)
├── commands/                 # Slash commands
├── agents/                   # Agent prompt templates
└── hooks/                    # Automation hooks
```

## License

MIT
